main event: A civilian observed a bright silver colored object that resembled an aircraft for 20 seconds before it disappeared from sight.
interesting points: The object was described as having a gently sloping top and flat bottom, resembling a saucer or bowl., The sighting occurred during clear weather conditions at approximately sunrise., The observer was a 17-year-old civilian assistant dairy sales clerk., The object was approximately 75 feet in diameter and was first noticed due to its brilliance., There was no sound associated with the object, and it appeared to accelerate rapidly before disappearing.
sighted object: a bright silver colored object resembling an aircraft
